basics.name: Julio César Díaz
basics.label: Front-End Developer
basics.summary: Front-End Developer with a passion for building web applications. Currently seeking opportunities to further develop my skills in a professional setting.

work.name: Freelancer
work.summary: Developing and maintaining websites for clients using modern web technologies. Collaborating with clients to understand their needs and deliver high-quality solutions.
highlights: Improved website performance by optimizing code
responsibilities: Designed, developed, and maintained responsive web applications using React and Next.js.
Collaborated closely with clients to understand their needs and translate them into effective technical solutions.
Optimized web application performance to ensure fast load times and smooth user experiences.
Worked with designers to faithfully implement UI/UX designs using Tailwind CSS for consistent styling.
Integrated APIs and backend services into web applications using REST and GraphQL.
Wrote and maintained unit and integration tests to ensure code quality using tools like Jest and React Testing Library.
Stayed updated with the latest trends and best practices in web development, proposing and implementing continuous improvements.
Created and maintained clear and concise technical documentation to facilitate project maintenance and scalability.
Planned and managed projects from conceptualization to final delivery, ensuring adherence to deadlines and client requirements using tools like Trello, Asana, or Jira.
Adapted to different technology stacks and specific project requirements, efficiently managing multiple projects simultaneously.
achievements: Successfully designed, developed, and deployed multiple web applications using React and Next.js, improving user engagement and performance metrics.
Optimized existing applications, reducing load times by up to 40% through code optimization and efficient use of resources.
Led the front-end development of a high-traffic e-commerce platform, resulting in a significant increase in user satisfaction and sales.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines for front-end projects, reducing deployment times and increasing release frequency.
Contributed to open-source projects, enhancing community tools and gaining recognition among peers in the web development community.

work.name: Legacy BHC
work.summary: Developed and maintained various web applications and managed IT infrastructure, ensuring smooth operations and security within the company.
highlights: Successfully developed and launched a website to manage company trainings and certifications, enhancing operational efficiency.
Implemented a clocking website to manage worker status and vacations, improving HR processes.
responsibilities: Developed a website to manage trainings and certifications using Next.js, Jest, Tailwind, and MongoDB.
Created a clocking website for managing worker status and vacations.
Maintained and updated company websites, ensuring they were up-to-date and functional.
Managed Microsoft Office 365 suites and provided support for Active Directory.
Configured and maintained Windows Server and Hyper-V Manager.
Installed and configured hardware and software for optimal performance.
Managed and maintained the network, including LANs, VLANs, WANs, firewalls, routers, switches, and VOIP phone systems.
Implemented and managed backup and recovery systems to ensure data integrity.
achievements: Developed and launched a critical internal website that streamlined employee training and certification processes.
Created and implemented a clocking system that improved the accuracy of employee work hour tracking and vacation management.

work.name: ETECSA
work.summary: Developed and maintained web applications to manage internal processes, updated legacy code, and ensured smooth IT operations within the company.
highlights: Successfully developed a website to manage telephone transfers in the region, improving operational efficiency.
Implemented a website to handle worker complaints and suggestions, enhancing internal communication.
responsibilities: Developed a website to manage telephone transfers using React, Jest, Tailwind, Django, Docker, and MariaDB.
Created a website to manage complaints and suggestions from workers using React, Jest, Tailwind, and MongoDB.
Updated legacy code and maintained older websites to ensure continued functionality and performance.
achievements: Developed and launched a critical website for managing regional telephone transfers, streamlining communication and operations.
Implemented a worker complaint and suggestion management system, improving feedback mechanisms and employee satisfaction.

education.institution: Universidad Central Martha Abreu de Las Villas (UCLV)

Enhanced HR operations and employee management
